content: s rs right side bor beginning of round ws wrong side wyif with yarn in front m1 make 1 with your preferred method how to make a tassel 1 materials needed 2 wrap yarn around small 3 slip double yarn under the book 20-30 wraps wraps book makes this easier tie yarn tightly around wraps 4 cut loops 5 turn inside out so that the knot 6 fold over and neaten the is to the inside if you are not top using twisted cord to attach the tassel leave knot at top 7 take a length of yarn and wrap 8 trim ends neatly tightly around tassel making sure the first end is held securely use tapestry needle to secure final end under the wraps page 6 charts chart a for size small/medium 8 repeats last repeat stitch count varies from 13 to 12 to 13 chart c page 7 chart b for size large/extra large 9 repeats last repeat stitch count varies from 13 to 12 to 11 chart c page 8 men s polo ralph lauren team usa opening ceremony earflap hat the original hat was knit top down and seamed at the back and the crown obviously it also has the official patch the original retail price is $328 page 9 original chart with 3-color rounds page 10
